sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-summary', template: `
{{ simsCount }}
  1. Sims Count
    Number of all sims...
    502
  2. Total Usage
    Total usage of all sims
    14MB
  3. Top x Customer
    x
` }) export class SummaryComponent { @Input() simsCount: number = 0; }
